name: NFL501 (Julia 1.9.4)
postCreateCommand:
bash -lc '\
set -euo pipefail; \
if [ -d NFL501/backend ]; then cd NFL501/backend; elif [ -d backend ]; then cd backend; else echo "backend/ not found"; exit 1; fi; \
julia --project -e "using Pkg; Pkg.Registry.add(\"General\"); Pkg.instantiate(); Pkg.precompile()" \
'
